imgText: Mean3 is proud to share a testimonial from Asif Sumsum, Chairman of ABAD and Sumsum Group. He commends Mean3 as a reliable and trusted partner, highlighting the team's professionalism and ability to deliver results while offering cost-effective solutions. He also praises the leadership of CEO Abdul Hadi for his strategic vision and excellence throughout their collaboration.
Mean3 is delighted to unveil testimonial from Shayan Khan (Producer), Kiran Malik (Actress) , Faisal Qureshi (Director) and Mani (Actor) from Pakistan’s biggest film ‘Money Back Guarantee’ .

Zashko Films is an American film production and distribution company. It was founded in 2018 by Khawar Farooqi and is located in Texas, USA. Zashko Films is Known best for being the producer of Na Band Na Baraati, Money-Back Guarantee, and being the distributor of Durj and Sher Dil
Hyundai Shahrah-e-Faisal is an authorized 3S dealership of Hyundai Nishat Motor Pvt Ltd. which covers sales, services, and spare part supply for Hyundai vehicles.
